## inject() function

Injects a React.Context into a Reactive Function Component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function inject<T>(context: Context<T>): ReadonlyRef<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | Context&lt;T&gt; | The React.Context that should be injected into your component. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ReadonlyRef](./reactive.readonlyref.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
